resources.string: Get a steal at the Art League\'s Patrons\' Show
Swipe to the left for an overview of the app.

Art Thief makes it easy to build and submit a list of your favorite art from the Art League\'s Patrons\' Show. When your name is selected during the Patron\'s Show drawing, the highest ranked artwork from the list you submitted via Art Thief will be automatically selected as your chosen piece.
